Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Ominous sat next to Akron, across from Zardus and got right to it. He 
began tapping his fingers on the table top, sending streams of Energon 
electricity across it, lighting the rather dim room in a faint blue.
      "How would you like to get rid of the Maximals, the Predacons, and all 
of your enemies, and even the humans? I can do it, very easily too." He 
slammed his fist onto the table as he emphisized very, and that sent more 
streams of energy across the table top.
      "What I propose is this....In several weeks the Volcano my vessle is 
resting under will explode, sending a rather large ash cloud into the sky. 
What I plan is to fil lthe volcano with energon. When it finally errupts it 
will send the melted energon particles into the sky, and from there it will 
spread across the globe. I predict in two months, after it rains, and snows, 
and such, the earth will resemble a rock placed in a tub of acid. All plant 
and animal life will have been destroyed, the ocean will be turned into a 
harsh chemical, and the sky will be ash. Nothing will survive. And as you 
know, energon kills transformers. When it dose get into the atmosphere, it 
wouldnt be long before your kind dies out from it. You vessles can only 
withstand so much...and then your dead."
      Ominous trailed off, raising his arm and allowing a bolt to slither its 
way up into his shoulder. Akron sat, motionless, watching Ominous with those 
pink eyes.
      "All I want from you is to ensure that Megatron, and the Maximals, and 
the other no name rag tag factions dont try and stop me. And....also....to do 
this you and your men would have to be converted. Your sparks would be 
removed, your mech would be replaced with Liquid Energon....and you would be 
reborn an Energonian, with all the abilities therein." He leaned back a 
little in his cair.
      "I know its asking alot....but just think, you will be one of the first 
Energonians to rule Cybertron. Yes, you can have it after all the 
Transformers are dead, because once we rid the Ark of the Autobots and 
Decepticons, with the Energon atmosphere of course, there wont be much 
resistence on Cybertron. Meanwhile, I will further our species. Producing 
more and more Energonians." He concluded and folded his hands, sending 
another bolt up, over his arms, and into his shoulder.
      "What do you say Commander?" His silver eyes narrowed a little. "How 
would you like to be King of Cybertron? The Mighty Zardus of the Energonian 
Empire?"

--part1_76.61ce933.277169df_boundary
